full_text
The pain in Phyllis Hyman’s voice. Her songs. She was dying in front of us...dog...every song. Every lyric. It is literally the most heartbreaking story an artist can ever have...
Last night had to be the first time in history, someone got injured while recording a podcast. I literally strained my abdomen while recording. I’m in legitimate pain right now.
The only time they hype to put alotta black people in a commercial is in HIV commercials
Ya #MCM Calling 911 at 3 AM for a headache during a pandemic. He 31. And in the back of my ambulance.
Your headache is not considered “severely ill” no matter what your anxiety tells you. It’s not. You’re putting people at risk. Stop.
OR. Hear me out...maybe a temporary freeze on all rent and mortgages until you allow people to go work for the money they use to pay it. https://t.co/Iy9VkjvLiJ

And I’m not saying I’m tryna go out and let everybody cough on everybody and be 2 inches within the space of another human being. I’m just wondering...where’s the empathy? The humility in understanding that people really gonna be STRUGGLING. Like...BAD

Today was my first day back on duty post COVID.  Spending the next 3 weeks in the 🚑. I’ll just say...Long day to say the least. Exhausted and ready for some much needed rest already. Forgot how wild this city is after a month off. Stay home. It’s real out here. 🚑🚒🚨😷 https://t.co/dxvvnmvlpP
So y’all out here making COVID-19 commercials for y’all products with all the human contact and lack of social distancing in the world huh?

Lost a good friend, 2 coworkers/friends to this COVID-19 situation so far...and being infected with it myself...really has been a rough couple of weeks...ready to turn the corner on all of this...time to bounce back.

Government hoax, political angle, 5G tower, bats aside...this COVID-19 shit is no fucking joke and it’s killing people. I swore up and down I’d be always on the outside looking in. That’s a niz. And that test to see if you got it...bruh...

I’m a private dude...but I’ll share this with y’all for a teachable moment. I tested positive for COVID-19 today, and it has truly been a very rough couple of days. It can’t happen to you until it does. Please stay safe everybody. Bouncing back soon 💪🏾

And STOP showing up to the firehouse, COVID-19 testing sites, and the ER asking about testing. If you don’t have symptoms or a referral from your primary, no you cannot waste one of the tests that are already limited because you seen that Idris Elba is asymptomatic too.

My homegirl was quarantined with COVID-19 symptoms. And she has an auto immune disease...so she’s at high risk. She just got it back that she has pneumonia and not COVID-19. And everybody’s like “GREAT NEWS! THANK GOD”.........I really hate everybody.

To be clear, I am not saying nor am I implying that COVID-19 is not a real thing nor am I saying it isn’t a threat. Before anybody reads into this incorrectly. I’m just tired of people not reading past headlines or researching but having whole dissertations ready.
There’s a COVID-19 testing site right across from my firehouse...shit look like something out of a movie
Y’all not tired of the Democratic Party forcing you to vote for who they want to prop up yet?
